entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Need an API to get the collection 'element/iteration' type #77926
  • Unskip DoNotCopyValueTests #77925
  • Update 'use collection expr' fixer to support key-value-pairs/dictionaries. #77922
  • Block Insert (Alt-LeftMouse) does not work properly #77917
  • Source generator-filled partial method "go to definition" and "go to implementation" seem reversed #77916

Closed

  • Add documentation for TypeDefinitionDocument custom debug information #73816
    17.13
  • Unavailble link to Portable PDB v1.0: Format Specification #77910

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for 'with()' element when converting code to a collection expr #77928
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix EA layering for Razor.ExternalAccess #77927
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: disallow collection arguments for `[CollectionBuilder]` types #77924
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: update feature status #77923
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update null-conditional assignment feature status #77921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce main thread switches in VisualStudioProjectFactory.CreateAndAddToWorkspaceAsync #77920
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid computations in AnalyzerAssemblyLoader.AddDependencyLocation #77919
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Execute core compiler from full framework msbuild #77914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Make frozen doc state non-nullable #77896
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Simplify the code for getting source generator diagnostics into the diagnostics service. #77898
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, Next
  • Razor EA: load from ServiceHubCore #77720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Allow the new Razor project to access protocol types #77912
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Feedback from analyzer loading change #77780
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Dictionary expressions: remove PROTOTYPE comments #77876
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77915
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the link to the file Portable PDB v1.0: Format Specification #77911
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Dictionary expressions: support user-defined and dynamic conversions for expression and spread elements for dictionary target types #77860
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove richnav pipeline and package #77902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77835
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.12-telmet] Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type #77899
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: all diag analyzer work. #77881
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Detect regular method vs. operator mismatch during overriding and interface implementation #77885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
